revised_title: Experimental Method for Measuring Pressure in Detonation of High Explosives and Impact of Bullets
tldr: The author presents a method to measure the pressure produced in the detonation of high explosives or by the impact of bullets using a steel rod and ballistic pendulum. The method involves measuring the momentum of the rod and the end-piece after impact, allowing for the determination of both the duration of the blow and the maximum pressure developed.
